abstract: The research firm Gartner predicts which technologies will arrive in the workplace in 2012.
snippet: The research firm Gartner predicts which technologies will arrive in the workplace in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Gartner Inc., a research firm that advises top executives on information technology, sells peace of mind as much as insight. Buy this, says a Gartner endorsement, and you'll be moving with the rest of our forward-looking clientele. That is a big deal; even though $3.6 trillion is spent on information technology a year, few executives want to feel as if they are moving too fast or too slow.

headline.main: A Shopping List for Corporate Buyers
